ComicInfo.Title: Cobra Rising, Part 3
ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Cobra Rising, Part 3: A Night Raven jet flown by a Strato-Viper is sent on a mission from Darklonia and over the Arctic. Ghost Rider pilots the stealth fighter to intercept the Night Raven over Canada and the two pilots shoot each other down; the Cobra rescue chopper arrives first but Ghost Rider disguises himself as the Strato-Viper and captures the helicopter.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-08 06:22:01. [CVDB501041] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:41:25. [Issue ID 1460477]

ComicInfo.Inker: Jeffrey Veregge,Paolo Villanelli,S.L. Gallant,Stanley Lau,Paolo Villanelli
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: James Brown (J. Brown),Jeffrey Veregge,Paolo Villanelli,S.L. Gallant,Stanley Lau
ComicInfo.Characters: Snow Serpents],Darklon,Cobra [Doctor Mindbender,Cobra Commander,Vipers,Steamroller,Ghost Rider,Lady Jaye,Hardtop],Mainframe,Countdown,G.I. Joe [Duke,Strato-Viper
